alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern White Pine and southern Elko Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 1259 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 20 miles southwest of Ibapah, or 21 miles east of Schellbourne, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McGill, Schellbourne, Lages Junction, Cave Lake State Park and Tippets Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; White Pine County
